LAGOSUS Lake watersheds

Source: R/LAGOSUS-package.R
locus_ws.Rd
lagoslakeidLAGOS sourced unique identifier for the focal lake of the zone
ws_zoneidunique zone identifier equivalent to the focal lake lagoslakeid assigned by LAGOS
nws_zoneidunique zone identifier equivalent to the focal lake lagoslakeid assigned by LAGOS
ws_subtypeLAGOS watershed sub-type classification for the watershed
ws_equalsnwsflag indicating that the focal zone polygon is multipart
ws_onlandborderflag indicating zone is adjacent to or crosses the border with Canada or Mexico
ws_oncoastflag indicating the zone is adjacent to the coastline
ws_inusa_pctpercent of the zone (i.e., polygon) that is within the US border
ws_includeshu4inletflag indicating the ws extends beyond the focal HU4 and is connected via an inlet to an adjoining HU4
ws_ismultipartflag indicating that the zonal polygon is multipart
ws_sliver_flagNA
nws_onlandborderflag indicating zone is adjacent to or crosses the border with Canada or Mexico
nws_oncoastflag indicating the zone is adjacent to the coastline
nws_inusa_pctpercent of the zone (i.e., polygon) that is within the US border
nws_includeshu4inletflag indicating the nws extends beyond the focal HU4 and is connected via an inlet to an adjoining HU4
nws_ismultipartflag indicating that the zonal polygon is multipart
ws_statesabbreviation(s) of state(s) intersecting the zone polygon
ws_focallakewaterarea_hasurface area of focal lake for which the watershed (WS) is calculated
ws_area_haarea of focal zone polygon
ws_perimeter_mperimeter of the focal zone polygon including perimeters of any internal 'holes'
ws_lake_arearatioNA
ws_mbgconhull_length_mthe longest distance between any two vertices of the minimum bounding geometry convex hull enclosing the zonal polygon
ws_mbgconhull_width_mthe shortest distance between any two vertices of the minimum bounding geometry convex hull enclosing the zonal polygon
ws_mbgconhull_orientation_degorientation (from 0 to 180 degrees) of the line connecting the antipodal pairs defining the longest distance within the minimum bounding geometry convex hull enclosing the zonal polygon
ws_meanwidth_mws area (* 10000 m^2/ha) divided by the ws convex hull length of the focal zone polygon
nws_statesabbreviation(s) of state(s) intersecting the zone polygon
nws_focallakewaterarea_hasurface area of focal lake for which the watershed (NWS) is calculated
nws_area_haarea of zone polygon
nws_perimeter_mperimeter of the focal zone polygon including perimeters of any internal 'holes'
nws_lake_arearatioNA
nws_mbgconhull_length_mthe longest distance between any two vertices of the minimum bounding geometry convex hull enclosing the zonal polygon
nws_mbgconhull_width_mthe shortest distance between any two vertices of the minimum bounding geometry convex hull enclosing the zonal polygon
nws_mbgconhull_orientation_degorientation (from 0 to 180 degrees) of the line connecting the antipodal pairs defining the longest distance within the minimum bounding geometry convex hull enclosing the zonal polygon
nws_meanwidth_mnws area (* 10000 m^2/ha) divided by the nws convex hull length of the focal zone polygon
